oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Generalized parton distributions for the proton in position space: Zero skewness
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: CHAKRABARTI, D
MANOHAR, R
MUKHERJEE, A
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: virtual compton-scattering
nucleon
hera
electroproduction
mesons
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We present a study of the parton distributions in transverse position or impact parameter space using a recent parametrization of u and d quark generalized parton distributions (GPDs) H (x, t) and E(x, t) at zero skewness. We make a comparative study between different parametrizations and discuss the region of validity of the positivity condition. (C) 2009
